findings.title: Outdated description in executeSystemWithdrawls() function comments
findings.description: The `executeSystemWithdrawls()` function has an outdated description in the comments section, left from a previous implementation.

findings.title: Optimization: executeSystemWithdrawls() function reads _amounts.length from calldata multiple times
findings.description: The executeSystemWithdrawls() function reads _amounts.length from calldata multiple times, which can be optimized by storing it in a local variable.
